Posts.Content: Hi guys Just joined site have had same journey as most of you to get to this point. Had negative biopsy April 2015 still rising psa 14 so mri found shadow left lobe then trus guided biopsy. Left lobe clear right 17/20 Gleeson 9 Awaiting radical prostatectomy have my appointment Wednesday 18/5/16 Have read up on surgeon and procedure and this site and looks like davinci is my only option. Any questions I should ask surgeon Wed other than what I already know about him ie how many he did last year and the complication rate? I am 47 and fit and other than the elephant in the room lol
Posts.Title: pre opp prostate
